attributes.action: Inntroduce equal treatment of workers in relation to NIC class C contributions at The age of 60 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the prsent females working after their 60th birthday do not pay employee National Insurance Contributions and are treated as class C 

Males have to wait until their 65th birthday before they are treated similary.

This is an unfair practice and should be changed under the equality laws

rejection.details: Please note Government is already working towards this. Please see: http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/MoneyTaxAndBenefits/Taxes/BeginnersGuideToTax/DG_4015904
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
